I played this game numerous times and to this day it is still my absolute favorite game. The visuals are amazing, the puzzles progress in difficulty at an excellent rate, not too fast, not to slow. Even though it is a relatively fast game, the commentary will absolutely keep you entertained. If they make a third game, I really hope it is just as good as this one.
Portal and Portal 2 is the kind of game that everyone should play at least once

This game is, in my opinion, one of the best games ever created. It has a great ability to introduce new features and ways to use existing ones just once you think you've mastered the already existing ones. The story is engaging and characters interesting. Overall, is an extremely high quality, exceptionally good puzzle game.

It was a long long time ago, when I first laid my hands on this game. Now, I've got the chance to play it again, and it feels like a completly new game! I like every aspect of it, GLaDOS, Wheatley, Cave Johnson are back as friends from the past. I recommend this game for everyone, who likes to move his brain a little, andlike a bit humour in their games!

Played it with my mate for five hours straight. Turn off the mic on multiplayer. Open up console and type in mute_voice 1 then mute_voice 2 so you can use discord or whatever. Either way great game to mess about with your mates.

출시된지 10년 되서야 잡아본 포탈2를 하며 10년 전, 그 출시 해에 이 게임이 명작 소리를 들었는지 알 것 같았습니다.
1편에서 느낀 몰입감과 퍼즐에 대한 재미가 2편에 와서 한층 업그레이드 되었다고 할까요.
현재 나오는 AAA게임들에 비해 비교적 짧은 분량을 가졌지만 여운이 많이 남았습니다. 그건 1편도 똑같이 느낀 부분이구요. 
만약 누군가 심심풀이 땅콩으로 즐길만한 게임을 추천해 달라 하면 포탈시리즈는 꼭 해보라고 권하고 싶습니다.

iL gioco in modalità single player è geniale, ha un gameplay talmente innovativo e ben strutturato, da fare invidia a qualunque altro titolo. I personaggi sono ironici e sempre divertenti, e la possibilità di avanzare nella storia ti spinge a superare ogni sfida, livello dopo livello. Per non parlare della campagna cooperativa. La co-op è fantastica, con delle meccaniche di gioco che ti spingono DAVVERO a collaborare con l' altro giocatore. Dovete assolutamente giocarci  !!

主观：9/10 客观：10/10

Portal 2 is an absolutely timeless classic. I first played the game when it came out, then again a few years later, then again, and now again in 2021. The graphics obviously look dated, but not far too dated really.
The way this game involves mechanics of portals and the gels later on for puzzle solving is amazing.
And I love that Portal 2 expanded on the lore of the game, and gave us so much more.
If you liked portal, you will definitely like this one.
Only qualm is the game is just ~7 hours long.

Portal 2 est une excellente suite à Portal. Offrant plus de niveaux, de nouvelle mécanique est une histoire qui donne plus de détails sur le passé d'Apperture.

Point positif:
- Les contrôles sont mieux que dans le premier portal. C'est plus rapide est également moins lent.
- Plein de nouvelle mécanique ajoutée au jeu.
- L'histoire est excellente.
- La musique est géniale
- Les graphismes restent très beaux même pour un jeu qui est sorti il y a 10 ans.
- Les voix anglaise et française sont excellentes (même si j'ai un faible pour préférer la version anglaise)
- Le mode multijoueur est très fun à faire avec un ami
- La création de niveaux est simpliste, mais fun.
- Le nombre de niveaux que la communauté fait est énorme. Vous voulez plus de portal? Alors, aller là pour plus de niveaux.
Point Négative:
- Le mode défi est correct. Il n'y a pas d'archivement mais pour ceux qui veux défier leurs amis, c'est un bon choix.
- Peut être très court si on c'est ce qu'on fait.
- Le créateur de niveau est un peu limité. On ne peut faire que des salles de tests traditionnels. Je crois même que la majorité de la communauté utilise d'autres programmes pour faire leurs niveaux.

Sinon, excellents jeux, je recommande à tout le monde.

My friend used to play Portal 2 and Portal 1 (he still does) and it got me pretty interested.
So, he gifted me Portal 1. I am very glad that he did, because i then got Portal 2.
I am very glad that he showed me the Portal series, it's a great game, and I think there should be a Portal 3
Great game, but I wish there was more of it.
Too good then portal 1 and thank god they added multiplayer

An absolute masterpiece from Valve. The storytelling in this is brilliant once you decide to have an in-depth look at the game. The puzzles are creative and can really make you think about how to proceed with each test chamber.

Aside from the singleplayer, the multiplayer is also an amazing addition to this game and provides even more hours of fun with the bonus of doing test chambers with a friend! Valve have also provided a feature to create and build your own test chambers and while the features seem limiting, it is a nice feature for them to add onto an already brilliant puzzle game.

Finally, Steam Workshop continues to provide players with even more hours of fun, whether this is horror maps or extremely challenging maps. The Workshop is a really good way in keep pushing your puzzle skills!

10/10 would recommend purchasing.
